Review Text: This place doesn't open regularly, they have some Latin brunch days. Please update since we took a detour just to eat Venezuelan food and where highly disappointed

Name: Amsterdam Arepa's
Review Text: Poor service, no attention to basic details. Expected much more authentic Venezuelan food for a restaurant only open once a month. Disappointed, Not worth the hype.

Review Text: Worst service ever, dirty place, only chicken in the menu, they made us wait too long and they didn't inform that most of the food was finished. Bad experience!
